shellshocker

Class ControlCentral

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Canvas
        • shellshocker.ControlCentral
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ControlCentral
extends java.awt.Canvas
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener
    Runs the ShellShocker game by drawing graphics, creating a user-controlled weapon and character control system, and logic system for movement of all items in the game. Called by class TheGame.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ControlCentral()
      Default constructor for class. Makes calls to different classes to create features of the game such as the user-controlled vehicle, platforms, enemies, and weapons.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addBomb()
      Adds a bomb object to the list of active bomb objects.
      void addMine()
      Adds a mine object to the list of active bomb objects.
      void checkBombs()
      Checks to see if bombs have detonated be comparing locations.Bombs that have hit boundaries or enemies will detonate.
      void checkCheckPoints()
      Sets the checkpoint statistic of the user-controlled vehicle when the specified locations have been reached.
      void checkHit()
      Checks to see if mines can be detonated be contact with enemy entities.
      void checkHitBox()
      Checks to see whether the user-controlled character has hit a box object.
      void checkHitFlame()
      Checks to see if enemies have made contact with the damaging flamethrower weapon of the user-controlled character.
      void checkRange()
      Checks to see if all projectiles fired have impacted other objects, such as boundaries, other enemies, or the user-controlled character, in order to simulate realistic conditions.
      void checkRemoveEnemy()
      Checks to remove all enemies that have health levels less than or equal to 0 to simulate death conditions.
      void drawRagnar(java.awt.Graphics window)
      Draws the user-controlled character after performing calculations on the character's location.
      void enemyCheckNextLoc()
      Runs an artificial intelligence algorithm that checks the movements of enemy entities based on boundaries, other enemies, and the user-controlled character in order to simulate realistic conditions.
      void fireEnemy()
      Runs an artificial intelligence algorithm that causes enemies to shoot at the user-controlled character based on range.
      void keyPressed(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
      Invoked when a key is pressed. Pressing a key invokes a command that leads to a change in the game.
      void keyReleased(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
      Invoked when a key is released. Releasing a key invokes a command that leads to a change in the game.
      void keyTyped(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
      Invoked when a key is typed.Typing a key invokes a command that leads to a change in the game.
      void manageDoorOpeners()
      Manages the door unlocking mechanisms that allow for the user to unlock new levels of the game.
      void manageEndGame()
      Controls the final stage of the game by managing the primary goals of the game.
      void manageExplosions()
      Manages the explosion animations in the game.
      void manageLevel()
      Calculates and sets the level of the user-controlled vehicle based on health and points.
      void mouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Invoked when the mouse is clicked. Clicking the mouse invokes a command that leads to a change in the game.
      void mouseDragged(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Invoked when the mouse is dragged. Releasing the mouse invokes a command that leads to a change in the game.
      void mouseEntered(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Invoked when the mouse enters the screen. Entering invokes a command that leads to a change in the game.
      void mouseExited(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Invoked when the mouse exits the screen. Exiting invokes a command that leads to a change in the game.
      void mouseMoved(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Invoked when the mouse is moved. Releasing the mouse invokes a command that leads to a change in the game.
      void mousePressed(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Invoked when the mouse is pressed. Pressing the mouse invokes a command that leads to a change in the game.
      void mouseReleased(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Invoked when the mouse is released. Releasing the mouse invokes a command that leads to a change in the game.
      void newWeapon(double radians)
      Creates a new weapon projectile to the list of active weapon objects.
      void paint(java.awt.Graphics window)
      Paints on the canvas. Items drawn by the method include the main user-controlled character, platforms, a background, and enemy character.
      void removeEnemies(int x, int y)
      Simulates a bomb explosion by dealing damage to all enemy units in a specified range of the blast.
      void run()
      Used to create a thread, starting the thread causes the run method to be called in that thread. Calls the repaint method of Canvas.
      void setProfile(Profile p)
      Sets the current user profile object to the passed parameter.
      void setStartLocation()
      Finds and sets the start location of the user according to the profile.
      static void unPause()
      Resumes the game.
      void update(java.awt.Graphics window)
      Updates the canvas. Calls the repaint method which calls the paint method that draws content onto the canvas.

        public void checkCheckPoints()
        Sets the checkpoint statistic of the user-controlled vehicle when the specified locations have been reached.

      • manageLevel

        public void manageLevel()
        Calculates and sets the level of the user-controlled vehicle based on health and points.

      • checkHitBox

        public void checkHitBox()
        Checks to see whether the user-controlled character has hit a box object. If it has, the box is removed and then the effects of the box are activated.

      • manageEndGame

        public void manageEndGame()
        Controls the final stage of the game by managing the primary goals of the game.

        public void fireEnemy()
        Runs an artificial intelligence algorithm that causes enemies to shoot at the user-controlled character based on range.

      • enemyCheckNextLoc

        public void enemyCheckNextLoc()
        Runs an artificial intelligence algorithm that checks the movements of enemy entities based on boundaries, other enemies, and the user-controlled character in order to simulate realistic conditions.

        public void checkHitFlame()

      • removeEnemies

        public void removeEnemies(int x,
                 int y)
        Simulates a bomb explosion by dealing damage to all enemy units in a specified range of the blast.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the blast.
        y - the y-coordinate of the blast.

      • checkRange

        public void checkRange()
        Checks to see if all projectiles fired have impacted other objects, such as boundaries, other enemies, or the user-controlled character, in order to simulate realistic conditions.

      • checkRemoveEnemy

        public void checkRemoveEnemy()
        Checks to remove all enemies that have health levels less than or equal to 0 to simulate death conditions.
